description: Add user authentication with login, signup, and session management

tasks.title: Add User model
tasks.description: As a developer, I want a User model so that I can store user data
acceptanceCriteria: User model has id, email, password_hash, created_at fields
Model includes validation for email format
Password is never stored in plain text
Unit tests written for validation logic

tasks.title: Add User model tests
tasks.description: As a developer, I want comprehensive tests for the User model
acceptanceCriteria: Test user creation with valid data
Test email validation rejects invalid emails
Test password hashing works correctly
Test edge cases: empty strings, null values, duplicate emails

tasks.title: Add login endpoint
tasks.description: As a user, I want to login so that I can access my account
acceptanceCriteria: POST /auth/login accepts email and password
Returns JWT token on successful login
Returns 401 on invalid credentials
Rate limits login attempts
Unit tests for token generation logic

tasks.title: Add login CLI flag
tasks.description: As a developer, I want a --auth-token flag for CLI commands
acceptanceCriteria: Add --auth-token flag to root command
Token is passed to API requests in Authorization header
Flag can also read from AUTH_TOKEN environment variable
Unit tests for flag parsing and header injection

tasks.title: Add login endpoint tests
tasks.description: As a developer, I want integration tests for the login endpoint
acceptanceCriteria: Test successful login returns valid JWT
Test invalid password returns 401
Test non-existent user returns 401
Test rate limiting blocks after threshold
Test malformed request returns 400
